newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH PRESIDENT HAVEL, PM KLAUS SET MEETING THURS.
newsitem.headline: CZECH PRESIDENT HAVEL, PM KLAUS SET MEETING THURS.

text.p: Czech President Vaclav Havel has scheduled a working lunch with Prime Minister Vaclav Klaus for Thursday, the president's office said on Wednesday.
Presidential spokesman Ladislav Spacek said in a statement that the leaders would discuss "current" and "long-term themes", but he did not elaborate.
Havel and Klaus last met for individiual talks in early September after in which they discussed a crisis in confidence in Czech banks and the economic aspects of maintaining the national defence.
